original_title: Todo Mundo Já Foi pra Marte
overview: A journey, in animation format, through sensations and personal experiences with the pandemic. Made by 37 animators from Ceará, the film reveals a multiplicity of procedures, looks, styles, but also openings for the intimacy of its creators. In isolation, artists imagine and dream of other world possibilities in a flow of colors, shapes and desires.
title: Todo Mundo Já Foi pra Marte
